attributes.action: ammend the PGCE curriculum to include aspects of confidence - building, voice production and coaching
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think this would be very useful in making public presentations, in addition to the already thorough teaching and learning information included in the course content for teachers. The petitioner is calling on the Dept for Skills and Rt Hon Denham to consider this idea.
